summary: A collection of unit and integration tests that verify the functionality of AWS Secrets Manager operations—including creation, retrieval, updating, deletion, rotation, tagging, policy management, duplication, and server behavior—using the Moto library to mock AWS services and boto3 for client interactions.
business_intent: Provide automated validation of Secrets Manager client code to ensure reliable handling of secret lifecycle actions, policy enforcement, replication, and error conditions, thereby reducing regression risk and supporting continuous delivery of secure secret management features.
